alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Erie; Genesee; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:05PM EDT until August 29 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wyoming County in western New York... Cattaraugus County in western New York... Erie County in western New York... Eastern Chautauqua County in western New York... Western Allegany County in western New York... Genesee County in western New York... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 304 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Colden to near Frewsburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... West Seneca, Jamestown, Lackawanna, Batavia, Depew, Olean, Lancaster and Hamburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 47 and 48, and between exits 54 and 58. Interstate 86 between exits 11 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Erie; Genesee; Wyoming
